explains: v. 包围，围住；随信附上，随信装入

sentences.en: I enclose herewith a copy of the policy.
sentences.cn: 我随信附上一份保险单。

sentences.en: Please enclose your remittance, making checks payable to Valley Technology Services.
sentences.cn: 请随信附上您的汇款，支票收款方为瓦利科技服务公司。

sentences.en: I enclose two tickets along with this letter.
